infomation.name: General Black List
infomation.description: This file contains strings that will be filtered out in general chat messages.
infomation.author: wen_wen520

guide.string: This file is used to filter out specific strings in general chat messages.

filter_type.description: Filters messages that are exactly equal to the specified string.
Filters messages that contain the specified string.
Filters messages that start with the specified string.
Filters messages that end with the specified string.
Filters messages that match the specified regular expression.

guide.filtered: if is set to true, the string will be filtered out.
